author: Jon Tattrie
title: Chinese-Canadians donate masks, safety gear to Halifax police, care homes
description: A group of Chinese-Canadians who sent medical supplies to China in January are now donating masks and goggles to Canadians as they battle COVID-19.
content:
In January, a group of Chinese-Canadians gathered in Halifax to figure out how they could help friends and families dealing with the COVID-19 outbreak in China.
Michael Ruan of the Chinese Benevolent Association of Nova Scotia said his group and the Chinese … [+2012 chars]
